word: I have faith to believe you will not stop at the halfway house, but will follow on to know the lord, that you may know His goings forth are prepared as the morning. The Lord loves us, and all He asks is that you respond to His love."--Letter 22, 1894, pp. 6, 7. (To Capt. C. Eldridge--Title, "The Value of Chastening." Aug. 12, 1894.)
